what: Function for info about current R session — session_info
title: Function for info about current R session — session_info
Function for info about current R session — session_info
code: session_info(   r_version = getRversion(),   system = osVersion,   user = Sys.getenv("USERNAME"),   machine = Sys.getenv("COMPUTERNAME"),   time = format(Sys.time(), "%Y/%m/%d - %X"),   libs = .libPaths(),   env_obj = ls(all.names = T, envir = globalenv()),   header = paste0("\n", paste0(rep("=", 60), collapse = ""), "\n"),   limit = 12 )

code: write_log('A Simple Test.', file = 'log_file.txt') readLines('log_file.txt') #> [1] "2023-04-08 16:05:16 | luisg | A Simple Test. |"                   #> [2] "2023-04-08 16:06:27 | luisg | A Simple Test. |"                   #> [3] "2023-04-08 16:58:34 | luisg | A Simple Test. |"                   #> [4] "2023-04-08 21:04:27 | luisg | A Simple Test. |"                   #> [5] "2023-04-08 21:14:36 | luisg | A Simple Test. |"                   #> [6] "2023-04-08 21:17:08 | luisg | A Simple Test. |"                   #> [7] "2023-04-08 21:18:15 | luisg | A Simple Test. |"                   #> [8] "2024-09-19 23:48:08 | DESKTOP-R383IKG | luisg | A Simple Test. |"
